channel.title: Super Tools on Jeff Russell's Webstead
channel.description: Recent content in Super Tools on Jeff Russell's Webstead

item.title: “Super” Combinations from Tools of Titans
item.description: I’ve talked a lot about Tools of Titans here, but today I want to share my favorite trick for using the book. While every “tool” in the book is useful individually, I believe some of the material is even more useful when synthesized into a coherent whole. Below, I’m going to share the one that’s been on my mind the most recently, with a concrete example of the super tool in action.
